AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_Ambush_Goblins_Ranger_01. AD triggered when taking a turn

AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_Ambush_Goblins_Caster_01. AD triggered when taking a turn

PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight.synopsis: Goblin near the ogres joins the fight if player gets into combat with them.

AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01_0.speaker: Goblin Tracker
AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01_0.text: You'll look good with a few arrows sticking out of your gut!

AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01_0.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01_0.text: Gonna add your ears to my collection once you're dead!

PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight_0.speaker: Goblin Brawler
PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight_0.text: Oi! You fightin' them ogres, then you fightin' with me!
